posts.title: Play-Doh Poop Troop Playset
posts.content: Make playing with poop something the whole family can look forward to by sitting down with this Play-Doh Poop Troop playset. You and your little sculptors will be able to make fun and whimsical characters out of squishy Play-Doh turds.

posts.title: Treat Holder Phone Attachment
posts.content: Snapping the perfect photo of your furry friend is easier than ever with this treat holder phone attachment. The device easily clips to the top of your smartphone so that you can dandle a delicious treat and get your pooch to look directly into the camera.

posts.title: Pokeball Belt
posts.content: If you want to beat the rest, you have to dress like the best by accenting your look with the Pokeball belt. The design keeps your chosen Pokemon close at hand so that you can deploy their services at a moments notice should danger arise.

posts.title: Water Powered Rim Cleaning Brush
posts.content: Keeping your prized rims looking brand new year-round has never been more convenient thanks to this water powered rim cleaning brush. This rim cleaning set comes with everything from a specialized brush to a custom-formulated soap to ensure the ultimate shine.

posts.title: Lightsaber BBQ Tongs
posts.content: Use the Force to ensure all your meats are cooked to perfection by using these lightsaber BBQ tongs. These intergalactic tongs feature a lightsaber inspired handle that comes with a specially designed red sheath that masks the metallic BBQ tongs in true lightsaber fashion.

posts.title: littleBits Base Inventor Kit
posts.content: Get your kids interested in the sciences from early on by making learning fun with the littleBits Base Inventor Kit. It will challenge your future scientists and academics to build fun and playful inventions while learning valuable STEM skills.

posts.title: Dog Cooling Vest
posts.content: The only time it’s acceptable to dress up your pet for going outdoors is if it’s with the dog cooling vest. This stylish vest fits comfortably and features a reflective material in addition to specialized layers that facilitate evaporation to help your furry friend stay cool in the heat.

posts.title: LEGO Ninja Costume
posts.content: Transform your little tike into Lloyd, the illustrious warrior ninja with this LEGO ninja costume. Based on the mighty green ninja from the Ninjago series, this green ensemble includes the green pants, tunic, LEGO hands, and mask.

posts.title: Bottle Opener Ring
posts.content: Be prepared to get wasted at any given moment with the beer bottle opener ring. Forged out of stainless steel, this handsome looking ring serves the dual purpose of adorning your hand in addition to popping open your favorite brew with a flick of the wrist.

posts.title: Action Camera Dog Harness
posts.content: Get a canine’s view of the world by strapping on an action camera dog harness to your furry friend. The ergonomic design comfortably fits your pup while letting you mount the camera directly onto their chest for unobstructed footage of assholes being sniffed.

posts.title: Solar Charger Hydration Backpack
posts.content: Keep your high tech gadgets juiced up while on the go by harnessing the sun’s power with this solar charger hydration backpack. Apart from providing a 1.8 liter bladder with an anti-spill valve, it comes with a 5V USB port for easy hook up.

posts.title: Build Your Own Video Game Kit
posts.content: Education and gaming combine when building video games with the Bloxels kit. This app-assisted kit uses a specialized gameboard and colored blocks to help design and create every aspect of the video game – from the levels to the main characters.
